ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Autopsy
ResearchProjectDef.description: The primal butchering for organs, often used in rituals. However quite barbaric. You can perform basic autopsy through the butchering table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Autopsy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced procedures allows for a more humane and precise organ extraction. This research unlocks the autopsy table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glitterworld Autopsy
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the right tools, training and technology, you can perserve human organs with the same success chance as in the core planets.
